Address.value: 4 PAR-LA-VILLE ROAD,CROWN HOUSE, SECOND FLOOR, HAMILTON, HM 08, Bermuda

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Nabors Industries Ltd is one of the world's largest land rig drilling contractors. The company has more than 500 land rigs, more than 600 land workover rigs, and numerous offshore rigs that drill for oil and natural gas globally. The company derives about 75% of its revenue from North America. In addition, The business consists of five reportable segments: U.S. Drilling, Canada Drilling, International Drilling, Drilling Solutions, and Rig Technologies. Nabors provides well servicing, engineering, transportation, and other services for oil and gas producers.
